title: King's Champion
description: For over four thousand years he has been an Elf to command respect from warriors and Kings alike. He is Torrent, Kings Champion and one of the few to go fearlessly into the dangers beyond the portal to form a bond with the Elven Empire there. He is held in great honor beyond the boundary. He is a friend to the King and his sons and a respected ally. He has been sent by the Light King Daroth to relay an offer of friendship and help to bring the wars their to an end, for Daroth has seen a day when the boundary between their worlds will fail.Serenity has shrouded her life in mystery. None save King Daroth knows what she is or what she has done, for she walks a path she would rather none know of. She is an Elf of great beauty and talent and with one look of her silver blue eyes she has brought one of the greatest Elves her people have known to his knees. They are Life Mates, and though he would charge into her life and take it over she will not allow him to bully her into a relationship she feels neither of them are ready for. They both have a responsibility to tend to. That must come first, for they could be facing a new war. Theirs is a battle of wills and learning to bend with the raging winds of fate.
author: M.A. Abraham
